mapper.select: SELECT r.`id`, r.`conglomerate_id`, r.`company_id`, r.`staff_id`, r.`time`, r.`timeC`, r.`address`, r.`longitude`, r.`latitude`, r.`remark`, s.`staff_name` as `staff_name` FROM `attendance`.`registration_record` r LEFT JOIN `attendance`.`staff` s ON r.`staff_id`=s.`id` WHERE r.`staff_id`=#{staff_id} and year(r.`time`)=#{Year} and month(r.`time`)=#{Month} and
